entry.title: Mini Meows, Mighty Howls
entry.summary:
Author: alittlesplashofcolour

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,555Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: More of Buck and Eddie antics as cat and wolf.They get up to mischief, have adorable little moments together, Eddie's protective side comes out (a few times) and they start to pine after each other â€“ as humans and as animals.Or: Buck's still a bit of a menace. Eddie is pining.
